description:
Wanna shoot explosives with the Gatling Gun at the speed of your mom x100000? If yes, this mod is for you.

Standard fire mode: Fast tapes, more accurate, more tapes.
Scoped in mode: Just like the normal gatling gun, but with explosive tapes.
Note: This replaces the Gatling Gun in all modes.

Installation:
Step 1: Go to: Your Drive:\Steam\steamapps\workshop\content\387990\2447901696 and copy the Survival folder.
Step 2: Go to: Your Drive:\Steam\steamapps\common\Scrap Mechanic\ and paste the folder. Click "Replace the file in the destination".
Step 3: Start up SM and have fun!
name: Vajdani's OverPowered Gatling Gun
